price: Ṣé ìwọ l’o máa fún àwọn adití ní ọ̀rọ̀ gbọ́ tàbí o máa fún àwọn afọ́jú ní ìmọ̀nà àti ẹni tí ó wà nínú ìṣìnà pọ́nńbélé?¹
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
